TWIST: The way I see it

TWIST is a set of scribbles on various life events and the way I see them. The key objective of TWIST is to collect a set of life style articles in a subjective manner, from a blind scientist's point of view.

Adventures

Featured adventure

March 28, 2018

I wanted to provide some food for thought with regards to topics like fear, obstacle, disability, and a dozen other human virtues that were concentrated into a high density in a few days at Thorpe Woodlands adventure Centre. the place I once referred to as "the middle of nowhere, and edge of rational thinking".

Identities

Featured identity

November 27, 2017

What is a PhD, and who can do one? Here is an early account of my PhD student identity. A PhD can bring you intellectual, social satisfaction, while your purse also contains more than just dust.
